name: Taiv
headline: Taiv uses AI to make businesses TVs more entertaining & valuable.
description:
Taiv puts TVs on autopilot, automatically switching between cable, our own streaming channels, digital signage, and trivia.  Our proprietary AI model analyzes the live video feed and intelligently switches sources during commercial breaks, show changes, or based on the time of day, to show the best possible content & ads for any environment.

We offer this for free to venues and make money by selling ads, which we rev-share back with the venue, turning their TVs from a cost center to a profit center.
generated_description:
### Taiv: Elevating Business TVs with AI

**Overview**: Founded in 2018 and based in Winnipeg, Canada, Taiv is a forward-thinking startup that aims to transform how businesses use their TVs. As a part of Y Combinator's W20 batch, Taiv has captured the attention of more than 1,000 venues by seamlessly integrating AI technology into their television systems.

**Mission**: Taiv leverages artificial intelligence to make business TVs not just functional, but entertaining and profitable. This isn't just about a shiny new toy; it's about turning what was previously a cost center into a revenue generator.

**How It Works**:
- Taiv's system is designed to put TVs on autopilot. The AI evaluates live video feeds, toggling between cable, Taiv's streaming channels, digital signage, and trivia.
- It intelligently switches content during commercial breaks or show changes, targeting the most engaging content for the specific environment.
- Businesses can access this service for free while generating income from ads, which Taiv happily rev-shares back to the venue.

**Key Features**:
- **AI-Driven Content Management**: Auto-switching capabilities that keep viewers engaged without manual intervention.
- **Revenue Sharing Model**: By monetizing ad slots, venues can earn between $1,000 to $3,000 annually, turning their TV displays into profit centers.
- **Easily Integratable**: Taiv works with existing televisions and cable providers—no need for major overhauls or new equipment.
- **Versatile Content Options**: Includes short-form content from Taiv’s own channels, commercials tailored to the venue, digital signage for promotions, and interactive trivia to engage customers.

**Business Model**:  
- **Free for Venues**: The Taiv system comes at no cost to businesses, providing a risk-free way to enhance their TV experience.
- **Revenue Generation**: Through ad sales, Taiv collectively boosts profitability for its clients while creating engaging environments for customers. They maintain an impressive **99% renewal rate** among their partners.

**Notable Backing**: Led by Jared Friedman at Y Combinator, Taiv has garnered significant attention in the tech and business communities for its innovative approach. The team comprises 24 talented employees, all committed to enhancing the viewing experience in restaurants and bars.

**Real-World Impact**: Customers love Taiv. A diverse range of venues, from local bars to chain restaurants, have praised the service, noting how it has allowed them to better promote their offerings while earning income without extra labor.

**Takeaway**: Taiv is reshaping the way businesses interact with entertainment media. By using AI to enhance TV experiences, they are not only helping businesses capture audience attention but also assisting them in achieving financial returns—making your TVs superpowered.

Feel free to check out more about Taiv on their website: [taiv.tv](https://taiv.tv).
